verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nī mandiramu atiśr̥ṅgāramu nī prajalandariki Mahima tējassu meṇḍuga nimpi nūtana paracu dēva 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nī raktamu cindin̄ci nūtana janmamu nicci 2 Svāsthyamuga mammujēsi nī mandiramuna nilipi 2 Koduvalayandu kr̥pacūpin̄ci tr̥ptiga pōṣin̄citivi 2 Mahima... Mahima... Mahima... Nīke 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nī mandiramulō nityamu vasiyin̄ci vardhilledamu Anudinamu stutiyin̄ci nūtana balamunu pondi Anniṭiyandu dīvin̄cabaḍi dhanyulugā nuṇḍedamu Mahima... Mahima... Mahima... Nīke{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nī mandiramulō dorukun nityānandamu nirataṁ Śōdhana śramala yandu kadalaka sthiramuga nilacu Antamu lēni adbhutamaina ādaraṇa pondedamu Mahima... Mahima... Mahima... Nīke{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kōlpōtimi nī mahimanu mā atikramamula valana Kṣamiyin̄ci nimpumu dēva mahāprabhāva mahimanu Munupaṭi mahimanu min̄cina mahimatō niṇḍuga nimpumu dēva Mahima... Mahima... Mahima... Nīke{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Antamu varaku mammu sajīva rāḷḷavale nun̄ci Kaṭṭumu ātma mandiramu nimpumu adhika mahimanu Yugayugamulaku ghanata mahima nīku kalugunu gāka Mahima... Mahima... Mahima... Nīke{/lang-eng}
